Skyscraper’s amazing 728-ton stabilising ball

June 22nd, 2008 · No Comments

This is pretty cool. Skyscrapers use gigantic steel balls as mass dampers to minimize building movement during high winds, earthquakes, etc. Here’s what happened during the Chinese earthquake.
in action: a skyscraper’s amazing 728-ton stabilising ball
